name: Charlie Baker
tweet: The law also includes a new temporary sick leave mandate for COVID-related illnesses, quarantine and vaccinations.  We are pleased to have worked collaboratively with our colleagues in the Legislature on this bill to provide a solution to the issues related to the solvency fund.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I signed legislation that provides a fix to the treatment of COVID-related unemployment claims that will prevent employers' UI rates from spiking in 2021 and 2022.  It creates a new, predictable and stable formula to address recoveries related to COVID-19 claims.  https://t.co/cx6LG8YbvP

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today marks an important milestone in our fight against COVID-19 in the Commonwealth: I signed an order terminating the State of Emergency effective June 15, and rescinding most COVID-19 restrictions as of tomorrow, May 29 as we nears our goal of vaccinating 4 million residents.  https://t.co/bCURpV7wIC

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: It's crucial residents continue to practice social distancing.   We've closed schools + non-essential businesses, and @MassDPH has issued a stay-at-home advisory. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We're grateful for the thousands of health professionals across the Commonwealth who have signed up to support the COVID-19 response effort. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: This site builds on our efforts to increase COVID-19 testing in MA. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: .@MassLtGov + I had the chance to tour the COVID-19 testing site at @PatriotPlace in Foxboro that will perform up to 200 tests per day for symptomatic public safety workers. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: We are committed to ensuring the Commonwealth is a strong partner for cities and towns as we work together in the fight against COVID-19. name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Enhanced contact tracing is a  powerful public health tool in the battle against COVID-19.  This first-of-its-kind initiative will support better tracing of contacts of positive cases + support those in quarantine. #COVID19MA  üîó:  https://t.co/kWIbIlfAJg   https://t.co/63L9vjq7LG

name: Charlie Baker

tweet: As someone who has visited the Holyoke Soldiers' Home on many occasions to catch up with staff and residents, I am heartbroken by today‚Äôs news. The loss of these residents to COVID-19 is a shuddering loss for us all.

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: I thank the House of Representatives for quickly passing HR 6021, the Families First Coronavirus Response Act, and urge the Senate to pass the legislation. This will bring crucial resources to Massachusetts as we respond to COVID-19.

name: Charlie Baker

name: Charlie Baker
tweet: Today I issued an emergency order prohibiting most gatherings of over 250 people in an effort to limit the spread of COVID-19. name: Charlie Baker
